bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Series Capacitor Banks in Power Systems
IEEE Standard for Series Capacitor Banks in Power Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard represents a significant update to IEEE 824-1994. Series capacitor bank component and bank duty cycle ratings, equipment insulation levels, protective functions, component testing, instruction books, nameplates, and safety are covered in this standard

This standard represents a significant update to IEEE 824-1994. Series capacitor bank component and bank duty cycle ratings, equipment insulation levels, protective functions, component testing, instruction books, nameplates, and safety are covered in this standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
